tool_description: Performs comprehensive conflict of interest checks against existing clients, opposing parties, and case databases to ensure ethical representation.

client_name.description: Full legal name of the prospective client

opposing_parties.description: List of known opposing parties or entities involved in the case

case_type.description: Type of legal case (civil, criminal, corporate, family, etc.)

jurisdiction.description: Legal jurisdiction where the case will be handled

attorney_id.description: Unique identifier of the attorney handling the case

related_entities.description: Additional entities that may be related to the case

check_depth.description: Depth of conflict check: basic, standard, or comprehensive

error_messages: Client name required: Provide the full legal name of the prospective client
Invalid case type: Use a recognized legal case type (civil, criminal, corporate, family, etc.)
Invalid jurisdiction: Provide a valid legal jurisdiction
Invalid attorney ID: Provide a valid attorney identifier from the system
Invalid check depth: Use basic, standard, or comprehensive
Opposing parties required: Provide at least one opposing party name
usage: Provide client name, opposing parties, case type, jurisdiction, and attorney ID. Optionally specify related entities and check depth. The tool will search for potential conflicts and return a detailed report.

conflict_status.description: Overall conflict status: clear, potential_conflict, or conflict_found

conflict_details.description: Detailed list of any conflicts or potential conflicts identified

clearance_level.description: Level of clearance granted: full, conditional, or denied

check_timestamp.description: Timestamp when the conflict check was performed
